tool_description: A tool for conducting keyword research on Google, allowing users to find popular keywords in various countries and languages.

api_list.name: KeywordSearch
api_list.description: Fetches all popular keywords based on specified country and language.

required_parameters.name: glanguage
required_parameters.description: The alpha code for the language you want to use. For example, 'en' for English, 'fr' for French.

required_parameters.name: gcountry
required_parameters.description: The alpha code for the country you want to target. For example, 'us' for the United States, 'fr' for France.

required_parameters.name: gkeyword
required_parameters.description: The keyword you want to search for. Default is 'ukraine war'.
